description: Scheduler and worker orchestration that shards scan scopes, checkpoints progress, and routes tasks over HTTP/2 TLS1.3 connections.
steps: Define job schema capturing targets, policy, dependencies, and checkpoint cursor
Build scheduler service that shards the scope, limits concurrency, and persists checkpoints to Postgres
Implement worker pool clients that consume tasks over HTTP/2 TLS1.3, apply rate-limit/jitter, and report results
Add resume logic so interrupted scans restart from checkpoints and fresh secrets invalidate prior sessions
Write load/integration tests verifying massive scope distribution and checkpoint recovery
acceptance_criteria: Scheduler can allocate thousands of targets with checkpointed progress
Workers obey rate limits/jitter and authenticate server-provided tasks
Restarting the scheduler resets ephemeral secrets while preserving checkpoints
